revised_title: Investigating Symmetry Violations in Neutral Kaon Decays
tldr: The authors analyze the limits of symmetry violations in neutral kaon decays, focusing on CP-, T-, and TCP-invariance. They find evidence of small departures from CP- and TCP-invariance in the structure of and states, but no evidence of T-invariance. The study provides improved limits on the variances from these symmetries and suggests potential methods to further improve these limits.
